headline: State Street Highlights Record ETF Growth and Servicing Momentum in 2025 Midyear Megatrends Report
summary: BOSTON, August 13, 2025--State Street Corporation today released its 2025 Global ETF Megatrends Midyear Review, highlighting the accelerating pace of ETF innovation and adoption worldwide. With global ETF inflows reaching $900B in the first half of 20251—a 25% increase over the same period last year—the report underscores the structural transformation underway across asset classes, geographies and investor segments.
